attributes.action: implement the road tax pricing policy as it protects us
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Let's stop the criminals. The tracking system will allow the police to find their cars and scrap them. Imagine how well the traffic will flow without all those dodgy cars on the road. Boy racers will be a thin of the past.  Lives will be saved don't delay vote today.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
